title: Executive Order 11597-Amendment to Executive Order No. 11513 Increasing the Membership of the President's Commission on School Finance
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and statutes of the United States, Section 1 (b) of Executive Order No. 11513 of March 3, 1970, is amended by deleting "sixteen" and inserting "eighteen".
citation: Richard Nixon, Executive Order 11597-Amendment to Executive Order No. 11513 Increasing the Membership of the President's Commission on School Finance Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/307130
